title: XXVII. lectures, or readings, vpon part of the Epistle written to the Hebrues. Made by Maister Edward Deering, Bachelour of Diuinitie
author: Dering, Edward, 1540?-1576.
publisher: Imprinted by [H. Middleton for Lucas] Harison,
notes: Numerous pages misnumbered; pages 353-368 missing in number only.
Includes verses on Dering (signed "T.N."), beginning on signature 2I2v.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
